channel.title: lists on Organisation x Knowledge Base
channel.description: Recent content in lists on Organisation x Knowledge Base

item.title: Declutter
item.description: Note to self Maybe it will help reduce the anxiety surrounding this aspect of my life. I have been struggling every time a move comes up, this usually involves flying back home from school abroad, or simply just packing up alone. I hate possessions, I hate going through them and feeling wasteful if I throw them away, but simply giving them away sometimes require too much effort. I would do it if it were to be more accessible.

item.title: Moving out
item.description: Note to self moving date (17/07) what’s a sane order? I would say “other bits” first, obviously leaving the pc + monitor + peripherals until the day before but most clothes can be packed 3/4 days after a final laundry load (or I could just honestly wait to do laundry at the new place to save some dough) the boxes monitor (I wouldn’t put other things in) speakers + other bits rice-cooker + other bits pc leftover pantry items + other bits cookware + cutlery + other bits beddings the suitcases un: clothes (!

item.title: Groceries
item.description: Things to buy rice soy sauce lentils cereal dishwashing liquid a stock pot a small baking tray eggs butter pierogi soy sauce/that thing ketchup milk cheese bread potatoes deodorant eggs cereal muesli meatballs pasta condiments pasta (farfalle) pasta sauce (pesto) rice chickpeas cereal milk block of cheddar & ricotto ice cream broccy tomatoes bananas yoghurt? milk cereal (for him and for her) parmesan bread cream cheese soy sauce soyjacks bananas cocoa smol rice 1kg et Al jogury

item.title: Digital tasks
item.description: Arch fix it before you reinstall get a Windows VM going (bonus if I can achieve GPU passthrough) rofi emoji switcher is it possible to rice systemd-boot? the answer is no üò• neovim needs more of your attention background manga setup with hakuneko + zathura or mangodl with ranger backup files on the hard disk and make it btrfs! updated: no, going with ext4 vimwiki as git home zathura rice discord rice spotify rice migrate from wal to wpgtk i3 stuff: i3-notifier i3-resurrect i3-bar as a hidden status line make a theme randomizer/chooser with rofi make a rofi cheatsheet (I’m too alpha for this) floating vim everywhere üòµ thread configure broot transfer dotfiles to one folder and symlink everything git dotfiles + reddit post?
